name: TRV InsuraMatch
content:
Hiring Manager
TRV InsuraMatch
Hartford, CT

**RE: Software Engineer II Position**

Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the Software Engineer II position at InsuraMatch. With over 5 years of experience at Travelers, I have developed extensive expertise in insurance technology solutions using the exact technology stack specified in your requirements - JavaScript, Python, and SQL, along with AWS services and Twilio integration.

As a member of a 5-person innovation team at Travelers, I contributed to developing a new insurance tech product that launched in under 6 months using Node.js, TypeScript, and Vue.js. I helped build a cloud-native phone solution using Twilio and AWS Lambda, demonstrating the practical application of serverless architecture for customer interactions. My experience with microservices architecture includes working with AWS services like API Gateway, Lambda, and DynamoDB, while maintaining high code quality standards through comprehensive testing practices.

I'm particularly excited about InsuraMatch's focus on generative AI platforms. As a contributor to a patent for AI-driven analysis systems (US11,132,565B2) and through my current pursuit of Python for Data Science and Machine Learning coursework, I bring both established expertise and emerging skills in this rapidly evolving space. This ongoing learning demonstrates my commitment to growing technical capabilities, especially in areas crucial to InsuraMatch's future.

What attracts me most to this role is the opportunity to transform InsuraMatch's technology landscape while solving complex insurance technology challenges. I've successfully delivered multiple insurance-specific solutions and would welcome the chance to bring this experience to your team. My background in establishing testing best practices and providing technical guidance to team members aligns well with your needs for quality-focused development and mentorship.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to discussing how my skills and experience align with your needs.

Sincerely,
Michael Paulukonis

name: Vercel
content:
Michael Paulukonis
[michael.paulukonis@gmail.com](mailto:michael.paulukonis@gmail.com)
April 15, 2025

Hiring Manager
Vercel
New York, NY

**RE: Software Engineer, CI/CD**

Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my strong interest in the Software Engineer, CI/CD position at Vercel. The opportunity to contribute to the core infrastructure that powers developer workflows at scale is particularly appealing, especially given Vercel's commitment to enabling developers to ship the best products. Your mission resonates deeply with my passion for improving the developer experience and my desire to have a tangible impact on how software is built and deployed on the web.

My background aligns well with many of the key requirements for this role. I have extensive experience building microservices, designing and maintaining APIs, and working with JavaScript/TypeScript in full-stack applications. My experience with AWS, including services like Lambda, API Gateway, and SQS, demonstrates my ability to build and deploy scalable systems. I'm also familiar with modern frontend frameworks like VueJS and React, which enables me to contribute to improving user interfaces. Furthermore, I've consistently focused on testing and documentation to ensure code quality and maintainability throughout my career. My previous experience with CI/CD tools has allowed me to become familiar with what developers need from such platforms.

While I don't have direct experience building a CI/CD platform, I have a strong understanding of CI/CD principles and workflows, and I'm eager to apply my skills to this specific domain. I recognize the importance of webhooks in the CI/CD process, and I'm confident in my ability to quickly learn and implement them effectively. Although I haven't specifically enhanced the reliability of CI/CD *platforms*, I have focused on enhancing the reliability of various types of systems and have experience with on-call rotations and problem solving in high-pressure situations. I am comfortable with adapting my skills to new technologies and domains and am confident I can become a valuable asset to your team.

I am enthusiastic about the possibility of joining Vercel and contributing to your mission of empowering developers. I am eager to learn more about the specific challenges and opportunities within your CI/CD team and how my skills and experience can contribute to your continued success. Thank you for considering my application.

Sincerely,

Michael Paulukonis
notes: Good overview, nice writeup of things.
